info: The Audi A7's sleek elegance makes this sedan-like coupe-ish hatchback a looker. Behind the big hexagonal grille sits a turbocharged 335-hp V-6 bolted to a dual-clutch automatic that sends power to Audi's Quattro all-wheel-drive system.

The Cadillac ATS-V will rip apart Audis and Mercedes Benzes all day, but settle down to a nice comfortable highway cruise right after. It's not large, but it works as a real life sedan.

The 2022 Mercedes-Benz E-Class finishes near the top of our luxury midsize car rankings. It's everything a premium luxury car should be, with a first-rate interior, a comfortable ride, and plenty of technology.
